log-description-moderation: La seguente è la lista di tutte le azioni di moderazione.
moderation-already-merged: Questa modifica è già stata unita manualmente. Non ha senso approvarla o rigettarla.
moderation-already-rejected: Questa modifica è già stata rigettata.
moderation-approved-errors: Mancata approvazione di $1 {{plural:$1|modifica|modifiche}}: controlla i conflitti, etc.
moderation-block-ok: Utente [[Special:Contributions/$1|$1]] marcato con successo come spammer.
moderation-desc: Sottoporre a moderazione tutte le modifiche e gli uploads dai nuovi utenti
moderation-diff-no-changes: Nessun cambiamento al testo della pagina (modifica nulla).
moderation-diff-reupload: Questo è un ricaricamento di immagine (il testo della pagina non verrà cambiato).
moderation-diff-upload-notext: Questa immagine è stat caricata senza descrizione.
moderation-editing-your-version:
Stai editando la tua versione di questo articolo. E' stato sottoposto a revisione da parte dei moderatoriI.
Una volta approvato sarà visibile a tutti gli altri utenti.
moderation-edit-not-found: Cambiamento non trovato. Probabilmente è già stato approvato.
moderation-edit-queued:
Modifiche registrate e sottoposte a revisione da parte dei moderatori.
Puoi continuare ad editare la tua versione della pagina.
moderation-editchange-not-edit: Questa non è una modifica. Solo le modifiche possono essere cambiate.
moderation-image-queued:
Success: your image has been sent to moderation.
Once approved, it will be visible to other users.
moderation-merge-not-automoderated: In order to merge, moderator must also be automoderated.
moderation-merge-not-needed: Try to approve this edit first: manual merging might not be needed.
moderation-missing-stashed-image: This upload can't be approved: image is missing from the stash (probably deleted by the user via [[Special:UploadStash]]).
moderation-move-queued: Success: your suggestion to rename the page was sent to moderators.
moderation-nothing-to-approveall: No edits are pending moderation: nothing to approve.
moderation-nothing-to-rejectall: No edits are pending moderation: nothing to reject.
moderation-notification-content: New edit on page '$1' by user '$2' awaits moderation, click to see: $3
moderation-rejected-long-ago: This edit was rejected long ago, it can no longer be approved.
moderation-revert-not-allowed: Only automoderated users can revert images to previous revisions.
moderation-suggest-signup: To skip moderation in the future, please [[Special:CreateAccount|sign up]].
moderation-text:
This special page lists all edits which await moderation (approval or rejection).
See also: [[Special:Log/moderation|moderation log]].
moderation-unblock-ok: User [[Special:Contributions/$1|$1]] is no longer considered a spammer.
right-moderation-checkuser: Can see IPs of editors in the moderation interface
tag-moderation-merged-description: Another user's edit (moderator just resolved an edit conflict in it).
tooltip-moderation-approveall: Approve all edits from this user/IP
tooltip-moderation-block: Send further edits of this user to Spam folder
tooltip-moderation-editchange: Modify the text (or edit summary) of this pending change
tooltip-moderation-folder-merged: Edits manually merged by a moderator
tooltip-moderation-folder-pending: Edits which are not yet approved or rejected
tooltip-moderation-rejectall: Reject all edits from this user/IP
tooltip-moderation-unblock: No longer send edits of this user to Spam folder
